segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate processing dates and times.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying either the reporting agent or the BSP.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments occurring in the BSP-to-airline functional message to specify transaction totals of all agents by specified currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency for the total amount.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of agents reporting transactions for the specified currency.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the transaction totals for the specified currency.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify either the transactions for the reporting period in the CRS-to-BSPC functional message, or the billing analysis transactions and totals in the BSPC-to-airline functional message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate BSP reporting dates.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment to specify indicators relating to the BSP processing of the transactions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments occurring in the BSP-to-airline functional message to specify the transactions totals for all agents by specified currency for a billing analysis period.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency for the total amount.

segment.name: Number of units
segment.documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of agents reporting transactions for the specified currency.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the transaction totals for the specified currency.

segment.name: Quantity variances
segment.documentation: QVR, A segment to indicate monetary variances relating to BSP processing.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify the transaction data for an agent.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reporting agent.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the locale of the agent.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the BSP remittance period ending date.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the agent transactions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments occurring in the BSP-to-airline functional message to specify transaction totals for the agent.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency for the total amounts.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the transaction totals for the specified currency.

segment.name: Quantity variances
segment.documentation: QVR, A segment to indicate monetary variances relating to BSP processing for the agent.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify transaction type data.

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment to specify the transaction type.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments occurring in the BSP-to-airline functional message to specify transaction type totals of an agent by specified currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency for the total amounts.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the transaction type totals for the specified currency.

segment.name: Quantity variances
segment.documentation: QVR, A segment to indicate transaction type monetary variances relating to BSP processing for the agent.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: ALC-FTX-TAX-SG9-SG10-SG11 A group of segments to specify the transaction details.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment to specify the transaction.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the date of issue of the transaction.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference numbers relating to a transaction.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the agent and passenger involved in the transaction.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the location where the transaction took place.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate the currency relating to the transaction.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment to specify indicators relating to the processing of the transaction.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment to specify the type of transaction, in coded form.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate transaction monetary amounts.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment to indicate the charge.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the transaction.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment to specify tax and commission amounts.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify the ticket details.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to specify the ticket number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the date of issue of a refunded ticket.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the ticket.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, A segment to specify the substituted ticket number.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment to specify the product delivery sequence number.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: IMD A group of segments to specify the terms of payment details.

segment.name: Payment terms basis
segment.documentation: PAT, A segment to specify the terms of payment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate the monetary amounts associated with the terms of payment.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to the terms of payment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate the dates associated with the terms of payment.

segment.name: Agreement identification
segment.documentation: AGR, A segment to specify the agreement details.

segment.name: General indicator
segment.documentation: GIS, A segment to indicate payment processing codes.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the client.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify optional free text information.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment to specify the form of payment, in coded form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify related document details.

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment to specify the related document number.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment to specify the type of related document.

segment.name: Goods identity number
segment.documentation: GIN, A segment to specify stock control numbers.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: TDT-DTM-LOC A group of segments to specify coupon information.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment to specify the coupon delivery sequence.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify print and service provider information in free text format.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment to indicate the coupon charge.

segment.name: Goods identity number
segment.documentation: GIN, A segment to specify coupon stock control numbers.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a frequent flyer number.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment to specify services and products relating to the coupon or flight details.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the party to be billed.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying the carrier and flight number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate flight departure dates and times, and, coupon validity dates.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify airports of departure and arrival and to indicate transit stops.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify the total number of transactions per agent.
